products.description: Mac Test Package 1.0 - Happy Path
Mac Test Package 1.0 - Happy Path

Cisco Cloud Management is a module in Cisco Secure Client that enabled cloud driven profile and software updates. This module enables the endpoint to use Cisco Secure Client cloud infrastructure for deployment.

Cisco Secure Endpoint (formerly AMP for Endpoints) integrates prevention, detection, threat hunting and response capabilities in a single solution, leveraging the power of cloud-based analytics. Secure Endpoint will protect your Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, and iOS devices through a public or private cloud deployment.
Cisco AnyConnect VPN solutions help organizations provide highly secure remote access and increase flexibility and cost savings.
Cisco Umbrella provides secure access to the internet and usage of cloud apps everywhere.
Cisco Diagnostics and Reporting Tool is used to collect data for troubleshooting Cisco VPN.
Improve logon security for Windows using Start Before Logon.
Check the posture of your endpoints with ISE Posture.
ASA System Scan Posture Module is a service that comes with SecureX.
Cisco Network Access Manager optimizes network resources, troubleshoots performance issues and delivers a consistent end-user experience.
Cisco Network Visibility Module provides visibility into network connected devices and user behaviors.
Example Product used to demonstrate new functionality.
